meanings.definition: A high-ranking Shiite religious leader in Iran.
meanings.sent1: The ayatollahs in Iran hold significant religious authority.
meanings.sent2: Many people look up to the ayatollahs for spiritual guidance.
meanings.sent3: The ayatollahs decided to have a dance-off to settle their differences.
meanings.sent4: The influence of the ayatollahs in Iran is as powerful as a roaring lion.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ayatollahs in their traditional robes is etched in my memory.

meanings.sent1: Several ayatollahs gathered for a meeting in Tehran.
meanings.sent2: The ayatollahs' opinions on the matter varied greatly.
meanings.sent3: The group of ayatollahs decided to start a band for fun.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the ayatollahs was a shining beacon in troubled times.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the ayatollahs added a sense of solemnity to the event.
